TopicTitle: How to name your saves during the Elcano Challenge

Articles.Content:
I thought I read somewhere that saves could be named during your Elcano Challenge Journey is this possible and how, or is F5 the only way to save your game during the mission?

Edited November 8, 2015 by castille7
Question Answered

F5 basically just creates a save named "quicksave", while F9 loads the save named "quicksave".

Alt+F5 lets you name your save, while Alt+F9 lets you choose which save to load.
Or you can do it from the space centre screen.

Thank you DeMatt this is what I remembered reading but couldn't remember where!

- - - Updated - - -

Or you can do it from the space centre screen.

Thank you Van Disaster I hope to be earning my Elcano Challenge wings soon!
